name: Dodgeball - Adknown Games
description:
“Dodge, duck, dip, dive and dodge…” to get past as many stages as possible to reach the finals of the easy, medium or hard cup tournaments. Upgrade your players in the shop to win tournaments more easily. Use your elusive dodging skills to dodge opponent dodgeballs and timing skills to precisely aim and fire your own dodgeballs at the opponent!

- 12 new teams to play against
- 3 new tournament system
- Upgrade stats of player by earning coins
